card.name: Bolgress Bazz, Matchless Dragon Machine
card.text: ■ Multi ■ Double Breaker ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, you may return any number of Dragons from your mana zone to your hand.

card.name: Hyperspatial Bolshack Hole
card.text: ■ Destroy one of your opponent’s creatures that has 3000 power or less. ■ Choose one of the following. :► Put any number of psychic creatures that have total cost 5 or less from your hyperspatial zone into the battle zone. :► Put a fire psychic creature that costs 7 or less from your hyperspatial zone into the battle zone. ■ Hyperspatial Psychic

card.name: Gantora Maxivus
card.text: ■ Whenever this creature attacks, you may put the top card of your deck into your mana zone.

card.text: ■ Whenever this creature attacks, put the top card of your deck into your mana zone. ■ Double Breaker

card.name: Caiman, Temporal Flower

card.name: Super Flaming Hell's Scrapper
card.text: ■ Shield Trigger ■ Destroy any number of your opponent's creatures that have total power 5000 or less.

card.name: Ryusei Kaiser, the Eternal
card.text: ■ Double Breaker ■ Each of your creatures gets "speed attacker". ■ Your opponent's creatures are put tapped. ■ When this creature would be discarded by the effect of one of your opponent's spells or ability of an opponent's creature, you may put it instead.

card.name: Come On Pippi
card.text: ■ When you put this creature, choose one of the following. :► Put up to 2 Fire Bird psychic creatures that cost 3 or less from your hyperspatial zone. :► Put a Fire psychic creature that costs 6 or less from your hyperspatial zone. ■ Hyperspatial Psychic

card.name: Prin Prin, the Victorious
card.text: ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, choose one of your opponent's creatures in the battle zone. Until the start of your next turn, that creature can't attack or block. ■ Victory Psychic Link—If you have Ryusei Kaiser, the Victorious and Gaial Kaiser, the Victorious in the battle zone, link them to this creature and Gaial Ore Dragon, the Vainglory ■ Hyperspatial Psychic
